pullrequest.title: surface: expand documentation of friction and slip coefficients

content.raw:
Meta-comment: many times when changing/tuning `ode`-specific parameters such as the one updated in this PR, I always find useful to go check the ODE documentation for additional information. 
It would be great if the ODE documentation was referenced in some way to make sure that all users (even beginners) can easily reach the relevant ODE documentation. 

A possible problem of this is that Gazebo uses an internal ode fork, so it is possible that the upstream ode and and the internal ode fork diverges in functionalities, creating confusion.
